location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a letter from the Imam of Muscat (Saʻīd bin Sulṭān) in response to the official notification of the British authorities departure from Bombassa [Mombasa] and recommendations by Colonel Stannus that mercy be shown to the inhabitants of the island.The letter goes on to discuss the misinterpretation by the Imam of Muscat of some parts of the letter and the steps Colonel Stannus intends to take to correct this.Translation of a letter from His Highness the Imam of Muscat to Colonel Stannus, December 1826, translated by Samuel Hennell, Assistant to the Resident in the Persian Gulf.
